markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: ## Week 5 Lesson 2 ### Flower shop plus (with JavaScript) Let’s go back to our little website we coded in the HTML / CSS introduction. See picture below for inspiration: - Once the user hovers over the 4 icons, they should increase in size by 40%, once the users mouse leaves the icons their size should decrease to normal again - Make the Learn More button clickable. Once the user clicks on it: 1. Remove the black overlay so that we can see the flowers clearly. 2. Change the title from ‘beautiful flowers’ to ‘welcome to my flower shop’, give the text a background and change the color to blue. 3. Change the text of the button from ‘learn more’ to ‘buy flowers’, change the background color to red. ## Bonus If you can change the documents style with a button, try to change it back when the user clicks the button again.
